name: Bostil Support
description:
Company Bostil – a team of IT professionals. We are located in New Jersey, USA and Gomel, Belarus. We develop software, ranging from simple Web applications and mobile applications to complex systems of accounting and analysis. 
JavaScript, Angular, AngularJS, React, JQuery, Vue.js, HTML5 \ CSS3, SCSS, LESS, Webpack, GIT, Gulp, Bootstrap.
PHP (Laravel, Yii, Symfony), Elasticsearch, docker.
C #, .Net, .Net core
